unnormalised: I've been seeing so many ads for apps promising to help you ace everything from JEE to UPSC exams. Think Byju's, Vedantu, Testbook... the list goes on! Some claim to provide personalized learning paths, mock tests that feel just like the real thing (including the nail-biting pressure!), and even instant doubt clarification.

unnormalised: My cousin, Priya, swears by an app for her NEET prep. She says the video lectures are way better than staring at textbooks all day. Plus, she loves the practice questions. However, my friend Rohan thinks they're a total waste of time. He says focusing on actual books and past papers is way more effective. He aced his IIT-JEE with old-school methods â€“ gotta respect that!
